column1: The Christian Funeral for Carlene will be held on Tuesday
column3: 2015 at 11:00 a.m. at Emanuel Ev. Lutheran Church in New London with Rev. Marcus Schulz officiating. Burial will be in Floral Hill Cemetery
column4: New London. A visitation for Carlene will be held on Monday
column6: 2015 from 4:30-7:00 p.m. at the Cline & Hanson Funeral Home in New London and also at the church on Tuesday from 10:00 a.m. until the time of the service.
